testcase.name: new DataRow should return an object
new DataRow should return a DataRow
new DataRow called with a DataRow object should throw exception
new DataRow called with an object already linked to a DataRow should not throw exception
new DataRow called with an object already linked to a DataRow should create an independent DataRow
DataRow called with an object already linked to a DataRow should return the linked DataRow
Initial value should be the same
Value should be changeable
Initial rowstate is unchanged
Changes does modify rowstate to modified
Reverting changes restores rowstate to unchanged
Deletes does modify rowstate to deleted
acceptChanges should not modify current value
DataRow.rejectChanges should revert modifications
dataRow.rejectChanges should revert field additions
dataRow.rejectChanges should revert field deletions
adding and deleting fields results in unchanged datarowversion
adding and deleting fields results in unchanged datarowversion
deleting and adding fields results in unchanged datarowversion
deleting and adding fields results in unchanged datarowversion
